data.title: DSI and Lawson Software form marketing arrangement on RFID and bar code data capture
data.meta_description: Under the agreement, the companies will co-market dcLINK, DSI’s automated data capture (ADC) and RFID solution, to Lawson customers worldwide. data.text:
Summary

Under the agreement, the companies will co-market dcLINK, DSIs automated data capture (ADC) and RFID solution, to Lawson customers worldwide. DSI will also be a one-stop source for Lawson customers to purchase handheld and vehicle-mounted data collection devices, RFID portals and interrogators, labels, tags, implementation services, and support.

DSIs dcLINK® provides RFID, bar code, and mobile data capture for Lawson M3 Overland Park, Kansas - August 17, 2006 - Data Systems International (DSI), a leading provider of RFID, automated data capture, and mobile applications, announced today a global co-marketing agreement with Lawson Software, Inc. Under the agreement, the companies will co-market dcLINK, DSIs automated data capture (ADC) and RFID solution, to Lawson customers worldwide. DSI will also be a one-stop source for Lawson customers to purchase handheld and vehicle-mounted data collection devices, RFID portals and interrogators, labels, tags, implementation services, and support. DSIs dcLINK is the industry-leading automated data capture software for tracking inventory, assets, and time in production, at the warehouse, and in the field. dcLINK offers RFID, bar code, and mobile data capture solutions that provide access to real-time data updates to Lawson M3, and these solutions are compliant with industry best practices, standards, and security. Lawsons Complementary Partnership with DSI for RFID and data capture solutions helps provide our customers with a solid foundation to make crucial business decisions based on access to accurate data, as well as providing them with access to a proven EPC-compliant RFID solution, said Dean Hager, Lawson Senior Vice President, Product Management. We are very pleased to be a Lawson Complementary Partner and to provide their customers with data capture software, devices, and media solutions that extend the reach and value of their Lawson M3 investment, said Matt McGraw, DSI Senior Vice President of Sales and Marketing. About Lawson Software Lawson Software provides software and service solutions to 4,000 customers in manufacturing, distribution, maintenance and service sector industries across 40 countries. About Data Systems International For nearly three decades, DSI has served clients with industry-leading technology solutions. Thousands of users world wide use DSIs flagship product, dcLINK, to accurately track inventory, assets, and time - in production, at the warehouse, and in the field. dcLINK is the one-platform RFID, bar code, and mobile data capture solution that integrates with leading enterprise software applications and complies with industry best practices, standards, and security.
